sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const Dashboard = () => { return (

Welcome to MedAI Copilot

Your intelligent healthcare assistant

{/* Skin Analysis Module */}

Skin Cancer Detection

Upload a skin lesion image for AI-powered analysis and risk assessment.

{/* Radiology Module */}

Radiology Copilot

Analyze chest X-rays and CT scans for pathological findings and anomalies.

{/* Triage Module */}

Virtual Triage Assistant

Describe symptoms for intelligent triage assessment and guidance.

{/* Quick Stats */}
0
Total Analyses
0
This Month
0
Urgent Cases
95%
AI Accuracy
); }; export default Dashboard;
